problem.markdown:
>>Which of the following is an example of a vegetable?||You can select only one option.<<
( ) apple ( ) pumpkin (x) potato ( ) tomato
[explanation] The potato is a starchy, tuberous vegetable from the perennial nightshade Solanum tuberosum. The word "potato" may refer either to the plant itself or to the edible tuber. [explanation]
